name: 丹妮拉·碧安琪
name_full: 丹妮拉·碧安琪 Daniela Bianchi
introduction: Date of Birth	31 January 1942, Rome, Lazio, ItalyHeight	 5' 7" (1.7 m)Mini Bio (1)Former Miss Rome and runner up for Miss World 1960, Bianchi made approximately 15 film appearances, the best known was playing Soviet clerk "Tatiana Romanova" in the sexy 007 adventure From Russia with Love (1963), in which her voice was dubbed by actress Barbara Jefford. Bianchi spoofed her spy role in the woeful OK Connery (1967), before effectively retiring from acting in 1968, and some years later she married a wealthy shipping magnate.- IMDb Mini Biography By: firehouse44@hotmail.comSpouse (1)Alberto Cameli	 (1970 - present) (1 child)Trivia (6)Winner of Miss Rome title in 1960.Runner-up 1960 Miss Universe contestMarried the president of an Italian cargo shipping company in 1970.Her voice was dubbed in From Russia with Love (1963); she spoke almost no English and spoke her lines phonetically. Her heavy Italian accent made much of her dialogue difficult to understand, so an English-speaking Italian actress whose accent wasn't so pronounced was hired to re-record her lines.Appeared opposite Sean Connery in the James Bond classic From Russia with Love (1963) , and opposite his younger brother, Neil Connery, in OK Connery (1967) (a.k.a., "Operation Kid Brother") four years later.Has a son named Filippo with her husband.
